sentences.en: A virus is a program that can self replicate or reproduce itself.
sentences.cn: 病毒是一种程序,可以自我复制或者复制自己.

sentences.en: Afew attempts to replicate Silicon Valley , most notably in Israel, havesucceeded.
sentences.cn: 有些对硅谷的复制企图, 以色列最为著名, 成功了.

sentences.en: But others have been unable to replicate the findings.
sentences.cn: 但是其它研究还不能发现同样的情况.

sentences.en: Cells can reproduce but only molecules can replicate.
sentences.cn: 细胞可以再生，但是只有分子可以复制。

sentences.en: Divergent results from replicate data entries may signify a program bug.
sentences.cn: 如果重复的数据输入产生不同的结果,就表明有程序错误.

sentences.en: He invited her to his laboratory to see if she could replicate the experiment.
sentences.cn: 他邀请她到他的实验室看她能否复制该实验。

sentences.en: If the virus cannot replicate itself, it cannot cause illness.
sentences.cn: 如果病毒不能变异, 也就不能够诱发疾病了.

sentences.en: Lava Spawns now require 15 attacks to replicate, up from 14.
sentences.cn: 火人现在需要攻击15下才会分裂, 而不是14下.

sentences.en: Meanwhile other studies have able to replicate the result.
sentences.cn: 然而,此结果未能在另一些群体中得到重复.

sentences.en: OGSA - RTMR is a branched data replicate system with real - time monitor function.
sentences.cn: 数据复制在网格应用中具有非常重要的作用.

sentences.en: The DNA of chromatin must replicate before cell division.
sentences.cn: 染色质DNA在细胞分裂之前必须复制.

sentences.en: The team decided to try and replicate the missing curtains as authentically as possible.
sentences.cn: 小组决定尽可能照原样重新制作丢失的幕帘。

sentences.en: The viruses replicate in skin cells, causing a variety of external growths.
sentences.cn: 病毒在皮肤细胞中复制, 产生多个外部增生物.

sentences.en: There is a need for further research to replicate these findings.
sentences.cn: 需要进一步的研究来验证这些结果。

sentences.en: To replicate a database programmatically, the database must be closed.
sentences.cn: 编程复制数据库时, 数据库必须关闭.

sentences.en: We should learn from these rather than replicate them.
sentences.cn: 我们应该从这些错误中吸取教训,而非重复它们.

words.tran_cn: 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音

trans.tran_cn: 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音

trans.tran_en: if you replicate someone’s work, a scientific study etc, you do it again, or try to get the same result again

trans.tran_cn: 复制，复写，重复，反复，折转，[生] 复制
trans.tran_en: if you replicate someone’s work, a scientific study etc, you do it again, or try to get the same result again
